revised_title: Maximizing the Likelihood Algorithm for Ion-Channel Gating Mechanisms
tldr: The authors present a maximum likelihood algorithm for estimating gating parameters from single channel recordings, allowing for the analysis of ion-channel gating mechanisms. They demonstrate the algorithm's performance using computer simulated data from various gating models and explore its robustness to omission of brief channel events. The algorithm can be applied to records with only one channel present in the membrane patch and can be extended to include channel gating models with multiple conductance levels.
